post.body: LOL the things we men do for the favor of the other sex. :D
your snew remark reminds me of a really old Kermit/Fozzie TV PSA involving that joke, only Fozzie called it Snu. :D
Er, I meant FISH...honest mistake. Really.
You probably already knew this, but cats aren't much better than fisk with regard to listening lulz
My roommate hopes this snowstorm in Portland convinces all the Californians and Mexicans to GTFO, bwahahaha.
I may not yet know what, if anything, I want for Christmas, but I admit to looking forward to getting stuff anyway.
The snowstorm we're getting here in Portland rivals many of the storms I dealt with back in Wyoming. Nice.
On the first day of Christmas my true love gave to me...a beer.
I'm pretty sure I've never given a ginormous bag of fancy-schmancy dog food as a Christmas present...gotta love recessions, lulz.
Gamefly can eat a big, fat dick.
Argh...no more deep freeze outside. Goddamnit.
Maybe I'm out of my mind (a distinct likelihood), but methinks Ralph Parker's mom really had it going on.
The combination of snow, wind, low temps and a low-paying job makes me want to skip my 5am start tomorrow.
What Movie Is Your Christmas Most Like? - http://tinyurl.com/58gk24 - How the Grinch Stole Christmas #blogthings
Took the day off to watch FOX Business; I must admit that I am still very much smitten with Shibani Joshi.
I swear, that governor Bobloblawich has the worst. haircut. ever.
I think I'll donate to the OR Humane Soc in my sister's name and tell her it's for "The Humane Fund: Money for Pets." Hahahaha
Just sitting here alone in the early-morning silence watching my cat stare at his foodz; thinking I should return to Lego Indy Jones
I got one of those Presidential dollar coins and since it was of #8 I decided to hang on to it in case I ever met the Van Buren Boys.
The answer is: Tryptophan :D
